text: hi everyone is Helen here today I will
be making husband and wife cakes is
called one food hi openSUSE in
Vietnamese this is a traditional cake
that is normally served at Vietnamese
weddings on the engagement or wedding
day the groom's family visit the bride's
house and offer many presents at the
proposal beside Vito and Erika Joe Gow Y
and T which are the must-haves husband
and wife cake is also a popular gift
choice because of its beautiful meaning
at weddings
the cakes are wrapped in tiny square
boxes made from coconut leaves the upper
part of the box fits perfectly with the
lower part which symbolize a perfect
caramel match in daily life the cakes
are sold at many snack shops and this is
wrapped in a less fancier form with
plastic wrap therefore people add more
colors to make it more attractive and is
a very beautiful and meaningful cake so
let's give it a try
to prepare the feelings wash the mung
beans a few times until the water become
clear and then soak it in water for an
hour after that put in a rice cooker
until they are soft and Mashable
transfer to a food processor add 4 tbsp
of sugar a tablespoon of vegetable oil a
pinch of salt some vanilla extract or
vanilla sugar and pull two processes
into a paste you will get mung bean
paste this is a very popular fillings
for many Vietnamese cakes
scoop out half a tablespoon amount press
and then roll it into a ball repeat
until you finish all the fillings to
make the dough in a large microwaveable
bowl add one cup of tapioca starch and
one cup of water
this is optional to make the cake a
little crunchy and 1 tablespoon of
molding starch and a tablespoon of water
basically the amount of water is the
same as the amount of starch also add 4
tbsp of sugar and a teaspoon of
vegetable oil to make it less sticky we
also need some shredded young coconut
which you can buy frozen an Asian store
it add more texture and flavor to the
dough about a quarter cup is enough
still really well to get everything
dissolved then microwave for 1 minute 30
seconds check out and you will see the
edges are quite cooked but the inside
still very liquidy give it a really good
stir again and microwave for one more
minute the butter is now half cooked but
the part in the middle is still very
liquidy now why still hot you are whisk
to vigorously and constantly stirring
until it forms into a half cup paste
like this the consistency of the paste
should look something like this
it's very sticky so you don't want to
stick your hands in there the
traditional cake in the coconut leaf box
has no color but I'm making the plastic
wrap version so I'm adding some panic
extract to give it some nice color and
aroma give it a good stir so that the
color is well blended in the paste now
grease some small condiment bowls with
vegetable oil you can also use ramekins
egg cups or muffin cups
fill the cup one platform with a paste
because it's very sticky used two
spatulas to transfer the paste into the
cups then add the filling and top up
with another layer of the paste the
stickiness of the taking symbolizes the
stickiness of marriage ties and the
golden filling embodies the loyalty and
faithfulness of husband and wife like a
golden heart very meaningful right such
as you a spatula to form it nicely and
repeat until you finish the paste now
we're going to steam the cakes for about
15 minutes or until they turn
translucent you can use a real steamer
or set up your own using a large pot
like this to prevent water from dripping
into the case tie the lid of your
steamer with a kitchen towel like this
the steaming time might vary depending
on the size of the cakes when you open
and can see the yellow fillings through
the outer layer that Ming is cooked let
it cool for about 30 minutes and we're
gonna wrap them nicely in the plastic
wrap now tail piece of plastic wrap
around 17 centimeter wide run the
spatula or spoon around the edges of the
cake remove it from the mold and
transfer to the plastic wrap
then folding tightly and cut off the
excess folding both ends and you will
have a really nice husband and wife cake
it's so pretty
if you want to access Emmy you can
sprinkle on the plastic wrap place the
cake on it and then also wrap it nicely
if you are bored you can make the cakes
in many different colors for example mix
some red and blue food coloring to make
it purple and then mix it with the dog
repeat the same with the rest of the
steps and you will have a very nice
purple husband and wife cakes I've tried
it with many different colors and they
come out really pretty these are our
final products you can see through the
fillings the coconut strips and the
season is on top let me give it a try
mmm it's super yummy the outer layer is
chewy and crunchy at the same time the
coconut strips add more to the texture
the fillings is just slightly sweet and
when combining with the outer layer it's
just a great harmony I hope you're gonna
like this recipe don't forget to thumbs
up and subscribe
thank you for watching bye bye
you
